get.description:
• The clusters are searchable.
  • Filter clusters by SEARCH_TERM: search=SEARCH_TERM
  • The clusters are paginated.
  • Jump to page PAGE_NUMBER: 
    page=PAGE_NUMBER
  • Provide CLUSTERS_PER_PAGE per page: 
    perPage=CLUSTERS_PER_PAGE
  • Example URI: http:\/\/localhost:8000/api/v1/clusters?search=ICT&page=2&perPage=15

post.summary: Store a newly created resource in storage

put.summary: Update the specified resource in storage

201.description: Why create, the cluster is updated not created

delete.summary: Remove the specified resource from storage

get.description:
• The courses are searchable.
  • Filter courses by SEARCH_TERM: ?search=SEARCH_TERM
  • The courses are paginated.
  • Jump to page PAGE_NUMBER per page: page=PAGE_NUMBER
  • Provide COURSES_PER_PAGE per page: perPage=COURSES_PER_PAGE
  • Example URI: http://localhost:8000/api/v1/courses?search=ICT&page=2&perPage=15
